title: Light, Fast & Responsive
text: This App consists of different Templates, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, unless you want to customize the default styling.

section.title: Who can use this App?
section.content: Anyone can use this app as long as you have to conduct examination and can not invest more time in designing it traditionally. Go Ahead and download it!!

section.title: More Features from the App
section.content: This application is not only helpful for generating question-papers, but it also can be useful to store your questions along with their appropriate tags and searching based on the same. Which eventually makes the retrieval easier and faster.
